typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulmnt
source(output(
		{ Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		toroll as string,
		indexcols2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		Commande as string,
		{Référence Offre BA} as string,
		{Qté Cdée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> association
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offre
source(output(
		{Cl� R�f�rentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Cl� EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal d�but} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{D�partement} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtc
InnerJoin derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation avec matching",
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> DerivedColumn1
association select(mapColumn(
		Commande,
		no_offre = {Référence Offre BA},
		{Qté Cdée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sAssociation
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		article,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		origin,
		no_offre,
		indexcols2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectfacturation
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
DerivedColumn2, sAssociation join({Document de vente} == Commande,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
facturation derive(origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn2
ecoulmnt derive(origin = "ecoulement") ~> sEcoul
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullleft
fullleft filter(isNull(selectfacturation@origin)) ~> filterLeft
filterLeft derive({Canal distribution} = "42",
		ca_final = toString(-1*toDouble(ca_ecoulement)),
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qte_ecc)),
		data_origin = "decrementation ecoulement sans matching") ~> DerivedColumn4
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRght
fullRght filter(isNull(sEcoul@origin)) ~> filterRight
filterRight derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation sans ecoulement",
		marque_name = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
addCanalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		indexcols2 = ecoulmnt@indexcols2,
		origin = sEcoul@origin,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
Select4 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endjoin
Select7, endRight union(byName: true)~> Union1
DerivedColumn1, selectOffre join(no_offre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		{ATC performance} = ATC,
		{offre canal} = canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectOffre
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectATC
refAtc aggregate(groupBy(Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> Aggregate1
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		{ Org commerciale} = {Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
endjoin, endLeft union(byName: true)~> Union2
DerivedColumn4 derive(canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> addCanalFinal
RemoveColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
Select9 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> Aggregate2
DerivedColumn6 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		article,
		{Code postal},
		marque_id = marque,
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final,
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
Union3 derive(marque_name = iif(marque=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> DerivedColumn6
Select6, selectATC join(marque_name == Marque
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAtc
JoinAtc select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select8
offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		canal = Canal,
		NbLogement,
		Produit,
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Créateur offre},
		Source,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select9
endLeft derive(data_origin = "ecoulement sans matching",
		ca_final = ca_ecoulement,
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qt_final))) ~> positifveEcc
Union2, positifveEcc union(byName: true)~> Union3
Select8 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OModelPartedis'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
DerivedColumn3 derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois début}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> DerivedColumn2
prixmoyen derive({Mois début} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn2 derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['prixmoyensplit'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> prixsplit

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as integer,
		{Canal distribution} as integer,
		{Secteur d'activité} as integer,
		{Document de vente} as integer,
		Poste as integer,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as integer,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as integer,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as double,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as integer,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as float,
		{CA cdé} as float,
		{Qté livrée} as float,
		{CA livré} as float,
		{Qté facturée} as float,
		{CA facturé} as float,
		{Cout standard cdé} as float,
		{Cout fabrication} as float,
		{Cout standard livré} as float,
		{Cout standard facturé} as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> newID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
newID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
changementDePeriodeFiltre derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, addperiod union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
facturation derive(test = toString({CA facturé})) ~> DerivedColumn3
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentielPrix.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput
